action.action-desc: Mr. Roe of Tennessee introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the amounts of educational assistance payable under Survivors' and Dependents' Educational Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Caring for the Families of our Wounded and Fallen Heroes Act.

section.header: Increase in amounts of educational assistance payable under Survivors’ and Dependents’ Educational Assistance Program of Department of Veterans Affairs

subsection.text: Section 3532 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2)(B), by striking $788 and inserting $1,224; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), by striking $788 and inserting $1,224.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to a month that begins after the date that is 18 months after the date of the enactment of this Act.
